name: Fish Shifters
description:
Let's play some Hide'n'Seek ?

What if I tell you that you're going to play against some Clown Fishs which has the ability to shapeshift ?

Try it, will be fun... =)

Look for the shapeshifters inside the cave, give them a poke to let they know that you found them, and run fast to poke the stone before they do.

[ KEYS ]
WASD / ARROW KEYS - MOVEMENT
SPACE - POKE

Please, give your vote for this game at Ludum Dare Page
http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-35/?action=preview&uid=57799
